usedPhoneNumber.message: This phone number is already linked with another user!

comingSoon.description: We're working hard to finish the development of this site. Our target launch date is December 2019 ! Sign up for updates using the form below!

landing.pave: Pave your career path with us! Learn, develop, enjoy and find great opportunities.
landing.weHaveWhatYouNeed: We Have Got What You Need!
landing.startDeveloping: Start developing your career using the First gamified learning platform to lead you to your desired position! A data driven platform using gamified learning to develop students' skills and experienceand to guide them through their future.
landing.learnSkills: Learn the most important skills to get your desired position!
landing.experience: Experience theory from the ground up and sharpen your skills!
landing.getGrades: Get grades for every achievement you get. Let Employers Know you are the best!
landing.downloadResume: Download your resume in ONE CLICK or simply copy a link!
landing.areYouInterested: Are you interested in joining our community and find the right talents you need?! Contact us!

skills.title: Skills
skills.dummyText: Can you code or speak another language? Add your skills here!

workExperience.title: Work Experience
workExperience.dummyText: Add Work Experience to your profile! From Babysitting to a barista job, add your experience!

hobbies.title: Hobbies
hobbies.dummyText: What do you love to do outside of work? Cooking? Sports? Traveling? Put it all here.

volunteer.title: Volunteer
volunteer.dummyText: Do you volunteer? Let people know about the causes you donate your time to here!

passion.title: Passion
passion.dummyText: What motivates you? What drives you? Tell us what you're passionate about!

funFacts.title: Fun Facts
funFacts.dummyText: What's something that most people don't know about you? Tell the world what makes you unique.

gigsAndFreelance.title: Gigs and Freelance
gigsAndFreelance.dummyText: Do you have a side gig? What about freelance work? Maybe working on a passion project? Talk about it here!

leadership.title: Leadership
leadership.dummyText: Do you consider yourself a leader? From sports to clubs to extracurriculars, we would love to know how you can lead a team.

videos.title: Videos
videos.dummyText: Do you have any videos of yourself (or videos that you helped make)? Are they on YouTube? Showcase them here!

awardsAndAchievements.title: Awards and Achievements
awardsAndAchievements.dummyText: Do you have any awards or achievements that would make a better candidate out of you? Add them here!

hint.volunteer: Have you volunteered? Add it to your profile to reach 30%.
hint.bio: Fill up your biography to reach {{percentage}}%.
hint.workHistory: Profile tip: To reach {{percentage}}% add your work history.
hint.skills: Add skills to your profile to reach {{percentage}}% complete!
hint.gigs: Do you have a side gig? What about freelance work? Maybe working on a passion project? Add it to your profile to reach {{percentage}}%.
hint.leadership: Have you held a leadership position recently? Add it to your profile to reach {{percentage}}%.
hint.passion: What drives you? Add your passion to reach {{percentage}}%.
hint.funFact: Add a fun fact to stand out from the crowd!
hint.hobbies: Profile tip: Add your hobbies to reach {{percentage}}%.
